Retrieve vacations for a specific user identified by their number

post.summary: Create or update a work record
post.description: Create a new work record or update an existing one based on the given day, month, and number.

200.description: Vacation record successfully created or updated

post.summary: Terminate or update a Work record
post.description: Update an existing Work record or create a new one based on the given day, month, and number.

200.description: Vacation record successfully terminated or updated

get.description: Retrieve all Work records from the database.

get.description: Retrieve all Work records from the database for a specific month.

200.description: Successfully retrieved all vacation records for the month

get.summary: Find work record by employee number

Find the count of work records by month for a specific employee number
Find work records by year for a specific employee number

post.summary: Upload CSV to populate work records

post.description: This API creates a leave record.

400.description: Invalid input or record already exists

get.summary: Find leave records by number and month
get.description: This API retrieves leave records for a specific employee by their number and month.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month (1-12) for which leave records are requested

patch.description: This API allows editing a leave record for an employee.

post.description: This API allows creating a record of duty days for a specific month.

get.summary: Find duty days record for a specific month
get.description: This API allows retrieving the duty days record for a specific month.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month for which to retrieve the duty days record.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which to retrieve the duty days record. Defaults to the current year.

patch.summary: Edit duty days record for a specific month
patch.description: This API allows editing the duty days record for a specific month.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month for which to edit the duty days record.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which to edit the duty days record. Defaults to the current year.

post.description: This API allows creating a work schedule entry.

get.description: This API allows retrieving all work schedule entries.

get.summary: Get work schedules for a specific month
get.description: This API allows retrieving work schedule entries for a specific month.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month for which work schedules are to be retrieved.

200.description: Work schedules for the specified month retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get work schedules for a specific year
get.description: This API allows retrieving work schedule entries for a specific year.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which work schedules are to be retrieved.

200.description: Work schedules for the specified year retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get work schedule for a specific user in the current month
get.description: This API allows retrieving the work schedule for a specific user in the current month.

200.description: Work schedule for the specified user in the current month retrieved successfully

post.summary: Get work schedule for a specific user in a specified month
post.description: This API allows retrieving the work schedule for a specific user in a specified month and year.

200.description: Work schedule for the specified user in the specified month retrieved successfully

post.summary: Get work schedule for a specific user in a specified year
post.description: This API allows retrieving the work schedule for a specific user in a specified year.

200.description: Work schedule for the specified user in the specified year retrieved successfully

post.summary: Upload CSV to populate work schedule records
post.description: This API allows uploading a CSV file to populate work schedule records.
